title: ASK ANDY:  How to Pitch an Investor (And a Question About Supply and Demand)
description: In this ASK ANDY episode of The MFCEO Project podcast, Andy Frisella answers two questions: (1) What do I do when the demand is more than the supply of inventory my company possesses and (2) How do I pitch an investor? Co-host Vaughn Kohler joins him in the studio.
